Title: Man of Steel
Plot: A young boy learns that he has extraordinary powers and is not of this Earth. As a young man, he journeys to discover where he came from and what he was sent here to do. But the hero in him must now emerge if he is to save the world from annihilation and become the symbol of hope for all mankind.
Writers: David S. Goyer, Christopher Nolan, Jerry Siegel
Stars: Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon
